abstract: The oil company reported another surge on stronger earnings from its refining, marketing and chemicals businesses.
snippet: The oil company reported another surge on stronger earnings from its refining, marketing and chemicals businesses.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON, April 26 — Despite a winter of relatively soft oil and natural gas prices, Exxon Mobil on Thursday reported another surge in profit for the first quarter of the year because of stronger earnings from its refining, marketing and chemicals businesses.

headline.print_headline: Exxon Says Quarterly Rise Is the Best In Its History
